name: mmb-portfolio-full-stack
description: Full-stack portfolio application with React frontend and FastAPI backend

scripts.install:backend: (command -v uv >/dev/null || pip install -U uv) && uv sync
scripts.install: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm --prefix frontend ci && npm --prefix frontend run build && (command -v uv >/dev/null || pip install -U uv) && uv sync
